Package RobotProjectGUI

Class Robot

java.lang.Object
RobotProjectGUI.ArenaItem
RobotProjectGUI.Robot
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bullet, ControllableRobot, HungryRobot, WhiskerRobot
public class Robot extends ArenaItem
Author:
dijan Class that represents a typical robot that is able to move around the arena.

  • Method Details

    • drawObject

      public void drawObject(MyCanvas mc)
      Draws default robot on screen by making a circle with two rectangles above and below it.
      Overrides:
      drawObject in class ArenaItem
      Parameters:
      mc - Canvas needed to draw the robot onto the canvas.

    • updatePosition

      public void updatePosition(MyCanvas mc, boolean isCollision)
      Logic for handling how the robot moves. If a collision occurs, robot needs to have a cooldown so that they can move after rotating.
      Parameters:
      mc - Needed for when checking if the new position is within the arena's bounds.
      isCollision - Needed for checking if it is colliding with another item.

    • partyMode

      public char partyMode()
      Party mode, where objects will move faster and have a rainbow colour for a few seconds
      Overrides:
      partyMode in class ArenaItem
      Returns:
      Next colour.

    • isValidPosition

      public boolean isValidPosition(double newX, double newY, MyCanvas mc)
      Similar to ArenaItem's method, except takes the robot's width/height into consideration.
      Overrides:
      isValidPosition in class ArenaItem
      Parameters:
      newX - The x position it wants to move to.
      newY - The y position it wants to move to.
      mc - Canvas needed to check if it is in the arena's bounds.
      Returns:
      If it is within the arena's bounds.

    • updateSize

      public void updateSize(double newRadius, double oldRadius)
      Allows for the robot to change size taking into consideration its wheel/body proportions.
      Parameters:
      newRadius - The new size the robot is turning to, needed to check proportions.
      oldRadius - The old size the robot is turning to, needed to check proportions.

    • getAngle

      public double getAngle()
      Getter - Provides the robot's angle.
      Returns:
      Robot's angle.

    • setAngle

      public void setAngle(double _angle)
      Sets the robot's angle.
      Parameters:
      _angle - The robot angle that it will be set to.

    • setSpeed

      public void setSpeed(double _speed)
      Sets the robot's speed.
      Parameters:
